meanings.sent1: After neglecting the attic for years, the cobwebbing was everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house showed signs of cobwebbing in every corner.
meanings.sent3: The spiders in the old barn were experts at cobwebbing the rafters.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned factory was a maze of cobwebbing, like a haunted labyrinth.
meanings.sent5: The morning dew highlighted the intricate cobwebbing in the garden.

meanings.definition: The process of covering or becoming covered with cobwebs.
meanings.sent1: The neglected shed was a testament to the slow cobwebbing of time.
meanings.sent2: The old curtains were showing signs of cobwebbing along the edges.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations added a festive touch of cobwebbing to the porch.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned mansion was a grand display of cobwebbing, like nature reclaiming its territory.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a treasure trove of forgotten items hidden under layers of cobwebbing.
